title: Meditation: Meeting Fear with a Healing Breath (2020-04-01)
itunes:title: Meditation: Meeting Fear with a Healing Breath
description: Meditation: Meeting Fear with a Healing Breath (2020-04-01) - This meditation guides us through a relaxing body scan and then explores how we can allow the breath to calm our body and bring peace to our heart.
content:encoded: Meditation: Meeting Fear with a Healing Breath (2020-04-01) - This meditation guides us through a relaxing body scan and then explores how we can allow the breath to calm our body and bring peace to our heart.

itunes:author: Tara Brach
